text: Bernhard Rust (30 September 1883 in Hanover â€“ 8 May 1945 in Berne, Lower Saxony) was the German minister of education, science and national culture, between 1934 and 1945. He was also a member of the Hitler Cabinet during the Third Reich.Claudia Koonz, The Nazi Conscience, p 134 ==References== Category:1883 births Category:1945 deaths Category:Government ministers of Nazi Germany Category:Members of the Reichstag (Nazi Germany) Category:Members of the Reichstag (Weimar Republic) Category:Nazis who committed suicide Category:Politicians from Hanover Category:Politicians of the Nazi Party Category:Politicians who committed suicide Category:Suicides in Germany
title: Bernhard Rust
